dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.helpText: You are going to be creating a new resume from scratch, but first, let's give it a name. This can be the name of the role you want to apply for, or if you're making a resume for a friend, you could call it Alex's Resume.

questionnaire.enterName: Please enter your name as you‚Äôd like it to appear on your resume
questionnaire.enterPhone: Please enter the phone number as you want it to appear on your resume.
questionnaire.enterCode: Please Enter The Code We Sent To
questionnaire.resume: Before we begin... do you have an existing resume to use as a starting point ?
questionnaire.createTip: We Will Help You Create A Resume Step-By-Step.
questionnaire.uploadTip: We'll Reformat It And Fill In Your Information So You Don't Have To.
questionnaire.jobTitle: Enter a target job title, jobs do you aspire to get?

validations.validName: Please enter your full name! e.g. "John Doe"
validations.incorrectCode: The code you entered is incorrect! please try again.
validations.expiredCode: The code you entered has been expired! send a new one.
validations.jobTitleRequired: You have to select at least 3 job titles!
validations.maxTitles: You cant select more than 10 job titles!

toasts.formErrors: You might need to fill up all the required fields before submitting this form.
toasts.doesNotExist: The resume you were looking for does not exist anymore... or maybe it never did?
toasts.loadDemoData: Not sure where to begin? Try loading demo data to see what CVitae has to offer.
toasts.printError: The cloud function is running into some trouble, please try again later or use the browser print feature.

sections.heading: Heading
sections.profileDesc: Hello Dear {0}, Double your chances for an interview! Resumes with filled-in contact details, job role, email, and other info usually receive much more views.
sections.objectiveDesc: Hello Dear {0}, Write 2-4 short & energetic sentences to interest the reader! Mention your role, experience & most importantly - your biggest achievements, best qualities, and skills.
sections.workDesc: Hello Dear {0}, This is the core of most resumes ‚Äì your professional story is told in dates, roles & bullet points. Start from your most recent job and go back no further than 10 years.
sections.internshipDesc: Hello Dear {0}, This is the core of most resumes ‚Äì your internship story is told in dates, roles & bullet points. Start from your most recent intern and go back no further than 10 years.
sections.volunteeringDesc: Hello Dear {0}, This is the core of most resumes - your Volunteering story is told in dates, roles & bullet points. Start from your most recent volunteer and go back no further than 10 years.
sections.educationDesc: Hello Dear {0}, A varied education on your resume sums up the value that your learnings and background will bring to the job.
sections.projectsDesc: Hello Dear {0}, Add here some other sections to interest the reader! Bibliography - your best hobbies, best projects, achievements, and awards.
sections.awardsDesc: Hello Dear {0}, Add here some other sections to interest the reader! Bibliography - your best hobbies, best projects, achievements, and awards.
sections.certificationsDesc: Hello Dear {0}, This is the core of most resumes - your Certificates story is told in dates, roles & bullet points. Start from your most recent Certificate and go back no further than 10 years.
sections.skillsDesc: Hello Dear {0}, Choose 5 of the most important skills to show your talents! Make sure they match the keywords of the job listing if applying via an online system.
sections.hobbiesDesc: Hello Dear {0}, Add here some other sections to interest the reader! Bibliography - your best hobbies, best projects, achievements, and awards.
sections.referencesDesc: Hello Dear {0}, Add here some other sections to interest the reader! Bibliography - your best hobbies, best projects, achievements, and awards.
sections.addsectionDesc: Hello Dear {0}, Add here some other sections to interest the reader! Bibliography - your best hobbies, best projects, achievements, and awards.
sections.groupsDesc: Hello Dear {0}, Add here some other sections to interest the reader! Bibliography - your best hobbies, best projects, achievements, and awards.
sections.skillsTip: Select 20 - Skills To Increase Interview Chances.
sections.objectiveTip: Write 200- Characters To Increase Interview Chances.
sections.awardsTip: Write 60- Characters To Increase Interview Chances.
sections.projectsTip: Write 60- Characters To Increase Interview Chances.

import.heading: Import Your Resume
import.text: You can import your information from various sources like JSON Resume or your LinkedIn to autofill most of the data for your resume.

export.heading: Export Your Resume
export.text: Export your resume as a PDF to share with recruiters or a JSON that you will be able to import back onto this app on another computer.

share.heading: Share Your Resume
share.text: The link below will be accessible publicly if you choose to share it, viewers would see the latest version of your resume at any time.

loadDemoData.text: Unclear on what to do with a fresh blank page? Load some demo data to see how a resume should look and you can start editing from there.

resetEverything.text: Feels like you made too many mistakes? No worries, clear everything with just one click, but be careful if there are no backups.

settings.translate: If you would like to contribute by providing translations in your language, <1>please visit this link</1>.

dangerZone.heading: Danger Zone
dangerZone.text: If you would like to delete your account and erase all your resumes, it‚Äôs just one button away. Please be wary as this is an irreversible process.

donate.heading: Donate to CVitae
donate.text: I try to do what I can, but if you found the app helpful, or you're in a better position than the others who depend on this project for their first job, <1>please consider donating as little as $5 to help keep the project alive</1> :)

bugFeature.heading: Bug? Feature Request?
bugFeature.text: Something halting your progress from making a resume? Found a pesky bug that just won't quit? Talk about it on the GitHub Issues section using the actions below.

appreciate.heading: Loved CVitae?
appreciate.text: I never get tired of hearing stories of how this app helped people, and if it helped you, or you just found CVitae to be an awesome tool, do let me know. You can reach out to me on my website.

sourceCode.heading: Source Code
sourceCode.text: Want to run the project from its source? Are you a developer willing to contribute to the open-source development of this project? Click the button below.

auth.Title: Get started with your account
auth.PrefillResume: Prefill your resume with data from your social profile
auth.byRegister: By Signing Up Via Your Social Profile Or By Email You Agree With Our Terms Of Use And Privacy Policy, And Cvitae.ai Terms & Conditions And Privacy Policy.

reactiveResume.heading: Import from CVitae
reactiveResume.text: CVitae has its own schema format to make the most of all the customizable capabilities it has to offer. If you'd like to import a backup of your resume made with this app, just upload the file using the button below.

jsonResume.heading: Import from JSON Resume
jsonResume.text: JSON Resume is an open standard for resume schema structure. If you are one of the many enthusiasts who have their resume ready in this format, all it takes it just one click to get started with CVitae.

linkedIn.heading: Import from LinkedIn
linkedIn.text: You can import a JSON that was exported from LinkedIn by clicking on the button below and selecting the appropriate file.

printDialog.heading: Use Browser's Print Dialog
printDialog.text: For those of you who want a quick solution, you need not look any further than your browser. All you have to do is press Ctrl/Cmd + P and open up the print dialog on your browser and get your resume printed immediately.

downloadPDF.heading: Download PDF
downloadPDF.text: These options allow you to print a single page, unconstrained version of your resume, perfect for those who have a lot of content. Alternatively, you could download a multi-page version of your resume as well with just one click.

jsonFormat.heading: Export to JSON Format
jsonFormat.text: You can also export your data into JSON format for safe keeping so that you can easily import it back into CVitae whenever you want to edit or generate a resume.

template.best: Here are the best templates for you
template.noworry: Don‚Äôt worry if it‚Äôs not The One, you can change it later.
